thread.title: This young nephew's reaction to his 5-star uncle picking UCLA over Ohio State is incredible
thread.title_full: This young nephew's reaction to his 5-star uncle picking UCLA over Ohio State is incredible

author: Morgan Moriarty
title: This young nephew's reaction to his 5-star uncle picking UCLA over Ohio State is incredible
text:
Kids do the darnedest things.
Sometimes when highly-touted high school football recruits makes their decision about where to go to college, not all family members are on-board with the decision. 
On Saturday, we saw yet another instance of an upset family member, and this time is was the nephew of five-star cornerback Darnay Holmes, who verbally committed to UCLA. Watch as his nephew excitedly points to the Ohio State hat, and then his reaction when his brother picks UCLA. 
CB Darnay Holmes' nephew is not pleased (h/t @bangulo ) #ArmyBowl pic.twitter.com/AGXhSBAL8V 
— #ArmyBowl (@ArmyAllAmerican) January 7, 2017 I guess you can’t please everyone in recruiting, right? Hopefully this adorable nephew can come around to visiting his uncle in Los Angeles. Holmes is the No. 2 cornerback recruit in the country, so the Bruins just got a huge pick-up with Holmes’ commitment.
